entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
